features: 【High durability & Great adhesion】The ipad tripod is made of ECO-friendly TPR material, which has excellent anti-slip & shock absorption & wear resistance performance. Aluminum cores inside the feet, flexible and durable, non-slip particulate feet provide highly steady support while standing on floors or even rocky beaches. Also, the mini tripod for iphone can achieve a high level of closeness when wrapped around a smooth railing, even strong wind disrupt, no gaps for firmly locked in place.

【360° rotation & Stability not falling】The 360° swivel ball head is made of ABS polymer material, sturdier and stronger, accurately target any landscape to meet diverse needs, adjust the ball head to any photography angle, including horizontal & vertical mode, tighten the screws beside to fix the device, simple achieve low & high angle shooting. More humanized, with detachable ball head, special paddle wheel design of the 360° round knob enables the device to get double security, not to fall.

【Wide compatibility & Small body，great capacity】The selfie stick uses 2 standard 1/4 inch threads, whether or not use the globe, can highly compatible with Gopro, 360 ° auto face tracking tripod, DSLR, video light, Nikon, Canon etc, also can be used as a small tripod for cell phones. Under the 11-ounce compact body, able to hold equipment weighing up to 2.6lb, which put into production with continuous Upgraded after several thousand tests in the market, approaching military grade quality.

【Multiple scenes & Great gift choices】3-in-1 usage as hand-held selfie stick Tripod, octopus & flexible tripod, phone tripod for desk, satisfying various needs, is excellent choice-iphone stand for video recording, self-timer, party, wedding, hiking, live streaming etc. Also, the cell Phone tripod Stand compact & lightweight to cost-effective, easily photography, video shooting, teleconference ect, is suitable for everyone as gifts for festivals, birthdays, anniversaries and other activities.

【What You Get & Warranty】Package Include 1× 3-in-1 Octopus Phone Holder, 1× GoPro Mount Adapter, 1× Phone Clip, 1× Wireless Remote, 1× Product Manual & After-sale Guarantee. The cell phone clip can be extended from 2.36 to 3.94’’, with a wireless remote control shutter, release your hands to capture photos at 33 feet away. If you have any concern about our product and service, please do not hesitate to contact us, we will solve them in 24 hours with a 12 month warranty. Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great tripod for the phone. Super flexible and can grip around anything. Perfect for uneven landscape shots along the rocky lakeshores.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am amazed by the quality of these parts and what they can do. It really can do all the things shown in the product description. I didn't have another cell phone, so I attached a calculator showing what a phone might look like. Frankly, what I was actually after was the Bluetooth remote. All the rest of this cool stuff was a bonus. I can't imagine how all this can sell so cheaply. Get it while you can, I say.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Way Nicer Than I Expected
reviews.reviewText: This tripod is really great. It's better than I expected. The ball head is plastic and I thought it might be the weak point. So far, that's not been the case. It works great. The legs are super flexible and work for many different surfaces and applications. The phone clip is a bit on the lightweight side and I did replace it with my more expensive, machined (fancy) phone clip that I use with my full size tripod. I wish it came with a case to slip it into. That is my only complaint. If they had an additional purchase, pouch or case, I would purchase it in a flash. This is a keeper. One note: Check the weight. It's fine for me but it is a bit on the heavy side. Good for me, so I can mount a camera on it if I want to. Might not be what you are looking for though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No wireless remote
reviews.reviewText: it states that there is a wireless bluetooth remote. THERE ISN'T ONE. they need to either add it in or change the description. Other than that I like the ease of setting setting it up and adjusting the angle and rotation. Fits and holds my iPhone 15 very well. It is pretty stable on flat surface collapsed or extended. However on a windy day or uneven surface it could easily fall over as would be expected. For my use it's perfect. I especially like the compact size when collapsed. Great for traveling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We liked it so much we bought another one!
reviews.reviewText: My husband bought one for us, we like it for ease of use when watching YouTube videos in our phones, then we realized it came with a photo clicker! That was awesome! I got amazing family photos with the clicker! The tripod is sturdy and flexible to mold to whatever surface we are using it on. It can wrap or stand straight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was flexible easy and simple

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid functionality, good value
reviews.reviewText: Great value tripod for iPhone videos. The metal ball-head is a nice touch, and is smoother than some similar tripods I’ve used. Bendy legs are nice- the rubber is grippy and the legs retain the shape without un-bending. The additional GoPro mount and remote shutter are good bonuses too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great gift for son doing stop motion video. Clicker is perfect! Easy to setup pretty much anywhere.
